mapper.insert: insert into delivery (deliNum, userID, addr1, addr2, recipient, phoneNum, basicAdd) values (seq_dNum.nextval,#{userID},#{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{recipient}, #{phoneNum}, #{basicAdd})
mapper.select: select * from delivery where userID=#{userID} and basicAdd=1
mapper.update: update delivery set basicAdd=1 where userID=#{userID} and deliNum=#{deliNum}
update delivery set basicAdd=0 where userID=#{userID} and basicAdd=1
mapper.select: select o.ordernum, o.order_date, b.psubject, b.subcategory, b.pimg, o.payment, b.ordercount, b.pcode from orders o, (select p.psubject, p.subcategory, p.pimg, p.pcode ,od.ordernum, od.ordercount from product p, (select max(pcode) pcode, count(*) orderCount, ordernum from order_detail where userID=#{userID} group by ordernum) od where p.pCode=od.pCode) b where o.ordernum=b.ordernum
select * from order_detail NATURAL JOIN product where userID=#{userID}
select f.fNum, f.pCode, f.userID, p.subcategory, p.psubject, p.pimg, p.price from product p, favorit f where p.pCode=f.pCode and f.userID=#{userID}
mapper.insert: insert into favorit (fNum, pCode, userID) values (favNum.nextval, #{pCode}, #{userID})
insert into pReview (rNum, pCode, title, contents, userID, created, cnt) values (seq_reivewNum.nextval,#{pCode}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{userID}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.select: select pr.rNum, pr.title,pr.contents,pr.userid,pr.created,pr.cnt,p.* from pReview pr, product p where pr.pCode=p.pCode and userID=#{userID}
select pr.rNum, pr.title,pr.contents,pr.userid,pr.created,pr.cnt,p.* from pReview pr, product p where pr.pCode=p.pCode and userID=#{userID} and rNum=#{rNum}
mapper.update: update pReview set title=#{title}, contents=#{contents}, created=sysdate where rNum=#{rNum}
mapper.insert: insert into qna (qNum, pCode, userID, qTitle, qContents, created, rStatus) values (seq_pdqNum.nextval,#{pCode}, #{userID}, #{qTitle}, #{qContents}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.select: select q.*, p.subcategory, p.pimg from qna q, product p where q.pCode=p.pCode and userID=#{userID}
mapper.update: update qna set qTitle=#{qTitle}, qContents=#{qContents}, created=sysdate where qNum=#{qNum}
